accountingCode.description: Number that represents the vendor is an external accounting system which may include details like "Address code" in it. This is the number as stated on the invoice

amount.description: The amount that is actually paid

batchNumber.description: Only required when voucher is being output automatically; date formatted or allow library to specify structure and start

disbursementNumber.description: The identifier for the physical transaction corresponding to a payment;Brought in from external source

disbursementDate.description: Date payment was made from financial system

disbursementAmount.description: The amount of the payment made outside of FOLIO

invoiceCurrency.description: The currency in which invoice was originally defined

exchangeRate.description: Exchange rate used to generate transaction

exportToAccounting.description: Export this payment record to a financial system

systemCurrency.description: The currency in which the voucher was paid

type.description: Indicates type of payment to account

voucherDate.description: The date the invoice status changes to approved

acqUnitIds.description: acquisition unit ids associated with this voucher

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
